rev.desc.rev.desc: update start panel, update log file name
update folder structure
improve log
improve status message
add auto merge feature
update panel decide.load.external, disable load external
update panel set.status.data, add space in the message
add panel load.data.post
Error occur when apply APM build on Customer DB
Set $G.UpgradeLogPath=$L.patchrelpath
update panel purge.nonEngPrmFmt
update panel init.clean
merge from ContentPack APM
add panels:
decide.load.extenal
load.data.external
remove panel set.version
delete gen.datadict
update load.dbdict panel: set exit -> load.dbdict.done
delete update.dbdict.keys panel
update load.dbdict panel: set exit -> gen.datadict
update load.dbdict panel:
panel type from file.load to sm.patchrel.load.dbdict.dta
update panel compile.screens, set exit -> pre.final.clean
add new panel "gen.datadict"
add panel "update.dbdict.keys"
Support 921 Application Patch 1
Support 711 Application Patch 2
bug fix, in panel save.status
Properly indexing into the patchrelinfo record.
Using "production-final" instead of production to go to the setup production info record.
Uses the selected language info record when applying a production patch.
Sets a language upgrade only mode when the target and current version are the same.
Catch the language data from the new screen
DE3727 If run in the background set $G.bg to true
Added preSM71.conversion panel to set the current step value appropriately prior to calling RAD=apm.upgrade.convert.preSM71.
Adding SC62 support back to the upgrade. (DE3346)
Removed any references to the versions prior to SC62:
Panel patch.config. Changed line 8 from:
if (not null($L.status.rec)) then ($L.version.pointer=index(current.version in $L.status.rec, {"SC5.1", "SC6", "SC6.1", "SC6.2", "SM7", "SM7.1"}))
to:
if (not null($L.status.rec)) then ($L.version.pointer=index(current.version in $L.status.rec, {"SC6.2", "SM7", "SM7.1"}))
DE3347 - removed any references to the versions prior to SC62:
** start panel line 25 changed from:
to:
$L.SCverArr={"SC6.2", "SM7", "SM7.1"}
** patch.config panel. Removed lines 14,15,16,24,25,26:
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC5.1 ($G.tmpSC51VerSeq)"
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC6 ($G.tmpSC6VerSeq)"
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC6.1 ($G.tmpSC61VerSeq)"
$G.tmpSC51VerSeq=index("SC5.1", $L.SCverArr)
$G.tmpSC6VerSeq=index("SC6", $L.SCverArr)
$G.tmpSC61VerSeq=index("SC6.1", $L.SCverArr)
** decide version panel. Removed lines 7,8,9,17,18,18:
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC5.1 ($G.tmpSC51VerSeq)"
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC6 ($G.tmpSC6VerSeq)"
$L.rem=" Version sequence of SC6.1 ($G.tmpSC61VerSeq)"
$G.tmpSC51VerSeq=index("SC5.1", $L.SCverArr)
$G.tmpSC6VerSeq=index("SC6", $L.SCverArr)
$G.tmpSC61VerSeq=index("SC6.1", $L.SCverArr)
** cleanup.temp.vars panel. removed:
cleanup($G.tmpSC4VerSeq);cleanup($G.tmpSC405VerSeq)
cleanup($G.tmpSC5VerSeq);cleanup($G.tmpSC51VerSeq)
cleanup($G.tmpSC6VerSeq);
cleanup($G.tmpSC61VerSeq);
Skip display.message if $L.bg is true.
Don't call purge in the data load step.
Pull calls related to unsupported versions.
sql.option default
Set the default for alter.mode in the status record
DE2116: Modified panel patch.config to set the correct varaible for 71 upgrade.
Changed:
$G.tmpSM7VerSeq
To:
$G.tmpSM71VerSeq
Skip inform.complete when the $L.bg flag is true.
TA3846 Paramaterize so it can be run from the command line.

DE1933: Modified decide.version, patch.config, set.status.display and start panels to support new "SM7.1" release. Added new decision panel for a call to custom upgrade routines in SM7.1 called 'decide.preSM71.conversion'
Added call to apm.upgrade.activity.key for preSC61 upgrades.
Recompile to fix broken parameter.
Remove references to Service Center
On decide.status panel, added checkpoint 47 for new upgrade routine added to RAD=apm.upgrade.convert.preSM7.
Modified decide.version, patch.config, set.status.display and start panels to support new "SM7" release.
I1753 - On decide.status panel, added checkpoint 46 for new upgrade routine added to RAD=apm.upgrade.convert.preSC62.
Added processing for severity and priority code field updates, with new panels beginning with decide.update.sev.code, and ending at pre.load.objects.
devtx I0785
modified version info on start panel to SC6.2
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 26208 Task 32928.

A new routine needed to be executed for customers upgrading from a version PRIOR to SC5.1 because from SC5.1 going forward, the status of the multi company flag was moved from the login.DEFAULT formatctrl record to the company record of the info file.

This new routine made an addition to the Step numbers (step 34.05) that the upgrade looks at to determine where to re-start should the upgrade need to be restarted. Modification was made so that this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) knows about this new step.
To effect this change, the following was done:
Panel decide.status:
The condition that exits to prepare.SC51.conversion was changed
FROM
current.step in $L.status.rec>=28 and current.step in $L.status.rec<=34
TO
current.step in $L.status.rec>=28 and current.step in $L.status.rec<=34.05
Modification made for DevTx ticket I2226.

Change was made to this application so that the application apm.upgrade.dbdict.foptions (which fixes the problem where the data in the file.options field of the dbdict was being stored in correctly) was moved so that it executes BEFORE the dbdicts are upgraded. It is now being called in this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) instead of being called from apm.upgrade.convert.preSC61.
Removed the exception message when running the upgrade straight through. Changed the message to be a bit more clear.

Modification made for DevTx ticket I1998. Added code in apm.upgrade.convert.preSC61 to call a new conversion routine, which is step 41. This made it necessary to change the line of code in this application's (apm.upgrade.wizard) decide.status panel to reflect this new step.
Modification made for DevTx ticket I1838.

Immediately after the dbdict is processed (apm.upgrade.dbdict), if the customer is upgrading from a version PRIOR to SC6.1, a call is made to apm.upgrade.ppl.actvactntbl. This populates table field of the current records of the activityactions file with the value of 'probsummary'.

Double-checked that the Step Numbers in the routines written by PBudic (in his 03/28/05 14:36:40 modification) are OK. Also, wrote a new routine to processs conversions that must be done if the customer is upgrading from a version PRIOR to SC4.
Moved many of the conversion routines into subroutines named apm.upgrade.convert.preSC*, where * is the version we are check.ing.
Removed extraneous code.
Modification made for DevTX Ticket I0704 (continuation of 3/11/2005 modification).
Added code to indicate whether or not there are any records in the sla file. This flag ($G.slaRcdExs) will be used by the upgrade to determine two things:
1) Whether to display the prompt that asks the customer which IM tickets should be converted for SLA
2) Whether the SLA conversion should be run at all.
$G.slaRcdExs=true means that there are records in the file
$G.slaRcdExs=false means that either the sla file does not exists OR that it exists that and there are no records in it
Modification made for DevTX Ticket I0704 (continuation of 3/11/2005 modification).
Added the call to RAD application apm.upgrade.soa.changes, which in turn calls the following applications:
. apm.upgrade.merge.extaccess
. apm.upgrade.datadict.soafields
. apm.upgrade.unexpose.soa.fields
Modification made for DevTX Ticket I0704.
The following modifications were made for the SC6.1 upgrade:

1) Cleaned up the sequence of when conversion routines are run after the major upgrade processes are complete. The sequence of events is detailed in the MSWord document named SC61_UpgradeMatrix.doc attached to DevTx Ticket I0704. Prior to this cleanup, it was very hard to trace which conversion was executed when.
2) Cleaned up the messaging (ie, the messages that get written to upgrade.log). Prior to this cleanup, some conversion steps were not putting out any messages.
3) Added the calls to the following RAD applications:
apm.upgrade.sla
apm.upgrade.rootcause (which in turn calls apm.upgrade.screlation)
apm.upgrade.fix.inbox
Modification made to get ready for SC61 Application Uprade. The following panels were modified to handle the new SC6.1 version:
. start
. decide.version
. patch.config
. set.status.display
. cleanup.temp.vars
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 34006 Task 31528. Placed a call to apm.upgrade.purge.nonEngPrmFmt. This deletes all non-English RAD Parameter formats.
To effect this change, the following was done:
Panel fix.trigger:
Nomal Exit entry changed from check.mode to purge.nonEngPrmFmt.
Panel purge.nonEngPrmFmt:
New panel.

Modification made for CenterPoint Request 30328 Task 30279. If upgrading from a version PRIOR to SC51, the application apm.upgrade.icm.cnvt.initial.format must be run. To effect this change, the following was done:
Panel SC51.specific.025:
Nomal Exit entry changed from SC51.decide.SC40 to SC51.specific.030.
Panel SC51.specific.030:
New panel (which is a call to apm.upgrade.icm.cnvt.initial.format).
Modification for DEVTX BUG15096 so that the IR keys are NOT regened in the upgrade.
To effect this change, the following was done.
1) Panel SC6.specific.015 (which is a call to the upg.regen.ir RAD application) was deleted.
2) The Normal Exit for panel SC6.specific.010 was changed from SC6.specific.015 to SC51.specific.000.
Modification made for DEVTX BUG14905 to ensure that the upgrade is run with the Client Side Load/Unload disabled.

To do this, at the beginning of the upgrade, the status of client side load/unload is saved in a variable. Then, client side load/unload is unconditionally disabled. At the end of the upgrade, the original status of client side load/unload is restored.
Modification made for DEVTX BUG 14630.

Panel prep.load.data is currently setting the value of current.step (ie, where it is in the upgrade process) to a value of 8 (ie, step 8, which is process pre.process.data). It should be setting it to step 7 (cleanup.data). To effect this change, this line
current.step in $L.status.rec=8
was changed to
current.step in $L.status.rec=7.
Modification for DEVTX BUG14611.
Made a change so that apm.upgrade.link is executed near the end of the upgrade. To effect this, the following was done:
1) Panel final.purge: change the normal exit from SC6.specific.000 to fix.links.
2) Added panel fix.links, which is a call to apm.upgrade.link. This then exits to panel SC6.specific.000.
Modification for DEVTX BUG14082.

Made a change such that if the call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 ends in error, this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) will stop execution. (apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 will send a message to the user informing him/her of the severity of the error.) If the call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 is successful, then execution continues with a call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2. If this call ends in error, this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) will stop execution. (apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 will send a message to the user informing him/her of the severity of the error).

The reason this change was put in is because if the upgrade of the dbdict dbdict fails, there is no sense in continuing the upgrade because the dbdict dbdict lies at the heart of the system. It that is messed up, everything else is meaningless.
For details of what was done, see the document named BUG14082ResolutionLog.doc attached to DEVTX BUG14082.
Modification for DEVTX BUG13933 and BUG13948.
Undid the change below (02/25/2004). Instead of forcing the "SC5.0" to "SC5"), the following was done:

1) Changed format upg.qiz.dbdict.1a.g so that the drop down list displays "SC5.0" instead of "SC5". This will then match what is stored (and what was shipped to the customer) in the application.version field of the scversion file.

2) In panels decide.version and patch.config of this RAD application, the array that contains the list of ServiceCenter versions have been changed so that the value of "SC5" has been changed to "SC5.0". Also in these two panels, where a search is done against this array and the search argument had been previously hard-coded as "SC5", this has been changed to "SC5.0".
Again, see the MSWord document named BUG13948ResolutionLog.doc for details of what was done.
Modification for DEVTX BUG13933 and BUG13948.

In SC5, the application.version field of the scversion file was being stamped with "SC5.0". In this application, when searching for the version that is being upgraded from, the code searches for "SC5". Made a fix so that it forces the value of "SC5.0" to be "SC5" when doing this search.
See the MSWord document named BUG13948ResolutionLog.doc attached to DEVTX BUG13948 for details of what was done.
Modification for DEVTX BUG11497 and BUG12039.

Starting with SC6, the ir files are now internal to P4 (in a file called scirexpert). Made a modification to this application so that at the end of the upgrade, it forces a regen of the IR files so that the this internal file gets populated.
Panel SC6.pecific.010:
Before this modification, this panel exited to SC51.specific.000.
After this modification, this panhel now exits to SC6.specific.015.
Panel SC6.specific.015:
New panel. It exits to SC51.specific.000.
Made the following modifications to handle the change where the field field,structure.array.options,temporal was added to the dbdict dbdict:
Panel show.message: Now exits to decide.fix.pre6dbdict instead of decide.fix.pre51dbdict.
Panel decide.fix.pre51dbdict: Renamed to decide.fix.pre6dbdict. This panel now check if upgrading from a version prior to SC6, not just SC5.1
Panel fix.pre51.dbdict.1: Renamed to fix.pre6.dbdict.1. This panel now calls apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 instead of apm.upgrade.pre51dbdfix.1.
Panel fix.pre51.dbdict.2: Renamed to fix.pre6.dbdict.2. This panel now calls apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 instead of apm.upgrade.pre51dbdfix.2.
The following modifications were done for SC6 . . .
Panel cleanup.temp.vars:
Added code to clean up temporary variable created for new version (SC6).
Panel decide.version:
Added code to handle new version ("SC6").
Panel final.purge:
Changed the normal exit from SC51.specific.000 to SC6.specific.000.
Panel patch.config:
Added code to handle new version ("SC6").
Panel SC6.specific.000:
New panel (decision panel). If the version being upgraded from is PRIOR to SC6, then it executes
the application that populates the datadict access field and the menu group field.
Panel SC6.specific.005:
New panel to execute application apm.upgrade.datadict.access.
Panel SC6.specific.010:
New panel to execute application apm.upgrade.populate.menu.groups.
Panel set.status.display:
Added code to default patches record to "SC6".
Panel start:
Modified the code to reflect the new version (SC6).
The apm.upgrade.devtype routine was not being called if upgrading from SC5 because of a bug in the code. Fixed the code so that apm.upgrade.devtype is called if upgrading from SC5 or prior.
The following details what was done:
1) deleted panel fix.devtype
2) deleted panel check.fix.devtype
3) changed the Normal Exit value of panel pre.reconvert.cm3 from check.fix.devtype to init.schedule
4) changed the Normal Exit value of panel SC51.specific.005 from SC51.specific.010 to SC51.specific.007
5) created new panel SC51.specific.007 (of type apm.upgrade.devtype)
Added code in panel decide.version to help upgrade process know where it is in the process.
Numerous modifications done for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287. See the document named Tsk22900Rqs24287A.doc attached to that task for details.

The following modifications were made for the SC6.1 upgrade:

1) Cleaned up the sequence of when conversion routines are run after the major upgrade processes are complete. To do this, at the beginning of the upgrade, the status of client side load/unload is saved in a variable. Then, client side load/unload is unconditionally disabled. At the end of the upgrade, the original status of client side load/unload is restored.
Modification made for DEVTX BUG 14630.

Panel prep.load.data is currently setting the value of current.step (ie, where it is in the upgrade process) to a value of 8 (ie, step 8, which is process pre.process.data). It should be setting it to step 7 (cleanup.data). To effect this change, this line
current.step in $L.status.rec=8
was changed to

Made a change so that apm.upgrade.link is executed near the end of the upgrade. To effect this, the following was done:
1) Panel final.purge: change the normal exit from SC6.specific.000 to fix.links.
2) Added panel fix.links, which is a call to apm.upgrade.link. This then exits to panel SC6.specific.000.
Modification for DEVTX BUG14082.

Made a change such that if the call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 ends in error, this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) will stop execution. (apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 will send a message to the user informing him/her of the severity of the error.) If the call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 is successful, then execution continues with a call to apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2. If this call ends in error, this application (apm.upgrade.wizard) will stop execution. (apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 will send a message to the user informing him/her of the severity of the error).

The reason this change was put in is because if the upgrade of the dbdict dbdict fails, there is no sense in continuing the upgrade because the dbdict dbdict lies at the heart of the system. It that is messed up, everything else is meaningless.
For details of what was done, see the document named BUG14082ResolutionLog.doc attached to DEVTX BUG14082.
Modification for DEVTX BUG13933 and BUG13948.
Undid the change below (02/25/2004). Instead of forcing the "SC5.0" to "SC5"), the following was done:

1) Changed format upg.qiz.dbdict.1a.g so that the drop down list displays "SC5.0" instead of "SC5". This will then match what is stored (and what was shipped to the customer) in the application.version field of the scversion file.

2) In panels decide.version and patch.config of this RAD application, the array that contains the list of ServiceCenter versions have been changed so that the value of "SC5" has been changed to "SC5.0". Also in these two panels, where a search is done against this array and the search argument had been previously hard-coded as "SC5", this has been changed to "SC5.0".
Again, see the MSWord document named BUG13948ResolutionLog.doc for details of what was done.
Modification for DEVTX BUG13933 and BUG13948.

In SC5, the application.version field of the scversion file was being stamped with "SC5.0". In this application, when searching for the version that is being upgraded from, the code searches for "SC5". Made a fix so that it forces the value of "SC5.0" to be "SC5" when doing this search.
See the MSWord document named BUG13948ResolutionLog.doc attached to DEVTX BUG13948 for details of what was done.
Modification for DEVTX BUG11497 and BUG12039.

Starting with SC6, the ir files are now internal to P4 (in a file called scirexpert). Made a modification to this application so that at the end of the upgrade, it forces a regen of the IR files so that the this internal file gets populated.
Panel SC6.pecific.010:
Before this modification, this panel exited to SC51.specific.000.
After this modification, this panhel now exits to SC6.specific.015.
Panel SC6.specific.015:
New panel. It exits to SC51.specific.000.
Made the following modifications to handle the change where the field field,structure.array.options,temporal was added to the dbdict dbdict:
Panel show.message: Now exits to decide.fix.pre6dbdict instead of decide.fix.pre51dbdict.
Panel decide.fix.pre51dbdict: Renamed to decide.fix.pre6dbdict. This panel now check if upgrading from a version prior to SC6, not just SC5.1
Panel fix.pre51.dbdict.1: Renamed to fix.pre6.dbdict.1. This panel now calls apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.1 instead of apm.upgrade.pre51dbdfix.1.
Panel fix.pre51.dbdict.2: Renamed to fix.pre6.dbdict.2. This panel now calls apm.upgrade.pre6dbdfix.2 instead of apm.upgrade.pre51dbdfix.2.
The following modifications were done for SC6 . . .
Panel cleanup.temp.vars:
Added code to clean up temporary variable created for new version (SC6).
Panel decide.version:
Added code to handle new version ("SC6").
Panel final.purge:
Changed the normal exit from SC51.specific.000 to SC6.specific.000.
Panel patch.config:
Added code to handle new version ("SC6").
Panel SC6.specific.000:
New panel (decision panel). If the version being upgraded from is PRIOR to SC6, then it executes
the application that populates the datadict access field and the menu group field.
Panel SC6.specific.005:
New panel to execute application apm.upgrade.datadict.access.
Panel SC6.specific.010:
New panel to execute application apm.upgrade.populate.menu.groups.
Panel set.status.display:
Added code to default patches record to "SC6".
Panel start:
Modified the code to reflect the new version (SC6).
The apm.upgrade.devtype routine was not being called if upgrading from SC5 because of a bug in the code. Fixed the code so that apm.upgrade.devtype is called if upgrading from SC5 or prior.
The following details what was done:
1) deleted panel fix.devtype
2) deleted panel check.fix.devtype
3) changed the Normal Exit value of panel pre.reconvert.cm3 from check.fix.devtype to init.schedule
4) changed the Normal Exit value of panel SC51.specific.005 from SC51.specific.010 to SC51.specific.007
5) created new panel SC51.specific.007 (of type apm.upgrade.devtype)
Added code in panel decide.version to help upgrade process know where it is in the process.
Numerous modifications done for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287. See the document named Tsk22900Rqs24287A.doc attached to that task for details.
